snippet.title: Tiger Blade - Announcement Trailer | PS VR2 Games
snippet.description:
Tiger Blade brings all the stylish, adrenaline soaked combat of the very best of Korean neo-noir action cinema to PS VR2. Become immersed in the atmospheric alleyways, city streets, and docks as you bring your professional retribution to the gang that turned on you.

Tear through enemies with your jingum, take out swathes of gun-toting gang members with your pistol, or grappling hook your way across obstacles as you pursue vengeance in the dark streets of Sewoon.

#psvr2 #psvr2game #tigerblade #ikimasho #bigsugargames

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information.
